name: cane
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] the long, hard, hollow stem of particular plants such as bamboo, sometimes used to make furniture or support other plants in the garden
[ C ] a long stick used especially by old, ill, or blind people to help them walk
Stockbyte/GettyImages
[ S ] a long, thin stick used, especially in the past, to punish someone by hitting them

the long, hollow stems of particular plants such as bamboo: [ U ] Chair seats are often woven out of cane.
A cane is also a walking stick with a curved handle, used to help someone walk.
